title: New: loonsweatshirt – it was nice knowing you got to get going
content:
Hailing from Minneapolis, loonsweatshirt’s debut effort is a piece of muffled beauty.

Entering with purpose, ‘it was nice knowing you got to get going’ is buoyed on an emotional bed of piano chords, while lyrically speaking into the heart of every break up that you may have experienced.

While there are limits as to how much one can take from a demo recording, loonsweatshirt’s vocals cut through with a warming tenderness, making it two minutes that you will find yourself playing on repeat.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d0e
